example.context:
DappNode - Shopify Store
Receive Shopify proceeds into your multi-signature wallet.
See Example Integrate Now

DappNode uses the DePay Shopify Plugin to receive payments peer-to-peer, directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers benefit from a seamless payment experience and an on-the-fly token conversion.

Checkout with DePay

After selecting the DappNode of their choice, customers can select DePay upon checkout to pay directly with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet.

DAppNode receives the payment directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet.

See Example Integrate Now

interactions.response: DappNode provides customers with the ability to pay with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet directly into the Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers can also benefit from an on-the-fly token conversion.
DePay is supported on Shopify, WooCommerce, Wordpress, and other web3 products.

The DEPAY Token is a cryptocurrency token created by DePay AG and used for DePay payments. It is an ERC-20 (Ethereum Request for Comments) token that is used to process payments, donations and other transactions across the DePay network.

responses: DAppNode offers a collection of tools and services that make it easier to deploy and interact with decentralized applications (DApps). It allows users to set up and manage their own Ethereum full node and interact with the Ethereum blockchain in an easy and secure manner. DAppNode also provides a suite of tools for developers, such as an Ethereum network explorer, an ETH wallet, an ETH address generator, and an Ethereum transaction builder. Additionally, DAppNode also provides users with an easy way to access popular decentralized applications, such as Uniswap, AAVE, and MakerDao.
The DAppNode platform currently supports Ethereum, POA, TomoChain, Binance Smart Chain, and Polygon.

The DEPAY token is the native token of the DAppNode platform. DEPAY is used to reward users for running DAppNodes and contributing to the network, as well as providing utility in the platform. It is an ERC-20 token and can be stored in any ERC-20 compatible wallet.
